entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 9:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023

Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 800 metres. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023
